title: Bug 12398 Accessibility problems
description: Bug 12398 Accessibility problems - I need to first click on one of the 'live' areas (e.g., the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame) before it starts working properly.
OB: When I launch the Help view on March 26, 2002, using Windows 2000, the tab key does not have any effect.
EB: When I launch the Help view on March 26, 2002, using Windows 2000, the tab key should allow me to navigate to different elements within the view.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Launch the Help view on March 26, 2002, using Windows 2000.
2. Press the tab key and observe that it does not navigate to any elements within the view.
